short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides a browser alert and audio notification of a new message, form or task within Shepherd.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension provides a browser alert and audio notification of a new message, form or task within Shepherd (https://shepherd.vet/). 

Note to Mac Users: In order to receive the browser notification (and not just the chime) you must click the Apple icon in the menu bar and then choose System Preferences. Click Notifications & Focus. Find the two instances of Google Chrome in the pane on the left, and in both cases turn on Allow Notifications by swiping the buttons to the right.

Development and maintenance of this plugin is sponsored by LightSky (https://www.lightsky.com)

The Shepherd logo is copyright by shepherd.vet. This extension is not managed or associated directly with Shepherd Veterinary Software.
